nl.tudelft.dnainator.core.impl

Class TreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.dnainator.core.impl.TreeNode

  • public class TreeNode
extends Object
    This class represents an item in the phylogenetic tree. The TreeParser returns the root item, via which all children can be accessed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      TreeNode(TreeNode parent)
      Creates a new TreeNode.

      Sets the name of this TreeNode.
